Special Write-ups Posted on Internet Homepage by Association for Friendship with Korean People
articles.content:
Special Write-ups Posted on Internet Homepage by Association for Friendship with Korean People 
   Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Association for Friendship with the Korean People based in Spain posted on its Internet homepage "Seminar on Songun" an article titled "Origin of Songun Idea", a photo of President Kim Il Sung organizing the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) and a photo of his mother Kang Pan Sok handing two pistols associated with the noble intention of his father Kim Hyong Jik over to him.
 The homepage in the article said that the Songun idea, which was founded by the President and is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, originated in the two pistols handed down to the President from his father and the programme of the DIU.    
 The homepage noted in detail that the President took over the idea "Aim High" and the two pistols from his father and pioneered the road of the Songun revolutionary leadership, while waging   the rigorous struggle.
